title: Soldier&#8217s Tale
description:
A concert poster design for Igor Stravinsky's L'Histoire du soldat (The Soldier's Tale). This poster is designed to capture the mood of the theatrical work about a soldier, devil and violin, and advertise an orchestra concert where the piece would be played.

Process
Sketched six concepts for client, and created multiple variations of the final poster for feedback. Created a Facebook Cover version of the poster for event invites.
